attributes.action: The need for more childcare for children, including SEN.
attributes.additional_details: The government wants people to work, if the childcare isn’t there how can they? Especially with Sen children they get discriminated and turned away because of their needs. The government wants people to work then they need to help.
attributes.background: To provide more childcare for working parents, especially children for Sen needs. Especially when there is schools that have no wraparound care.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641512

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase tax-free childcare allowance: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/645172
